changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, first_name varchar(100) NOT NULL, last_name varchar(100) NOT NULL, email varchar(100) not null unique, password BYTEA not null, role VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now(), updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT now(), enabled BOOLEAN NOT NULL ); CREATE INDEX users_email_idx on users (email);
